name: Worldwide Hunting
overview: Worldwide Hunting is an action game, developed by Golden Gate Crew and published by Golem, which was released in Europe in 1992. An urgent message comes from your favorite game preserve. The surplus of ducks and rabbits in the area is threatening to mean starvation and disease if we cannot act fast and reduce their numbers. Test your skills and patience, choose the proper firearm and get out in the bullrushes! Originally released for the Golem Light Gun Package, in 2019 Scoopex released a version with mouse support.
